pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interface to SDMX Web Services // Provides functions to retrieve data and metadata from providers that disseminate data by means of SDMX web services. SDMX (Statistical Data and Metadata eXchange) is a standard that has been developed with the aim of simplifying the exchange of statistical information. More about the SDMX standard and the SDMX Web Services can be found at: http://sdmx.org.
